channel.title: Android on all about apps
channel.description: Recent content in Android on all about apps

item.title: Android Template Project
item.description: Team Android Project Template As a software development company we are starting new projects every few weeks. With every project we create a jira ticket called Project Setup. We walked through all our Project Setup Jira tickets and calculated the average hours for this kind of task: In average every android project needs about 3.5 hours for a simple setup. On the other hand the project setup is boring and no developer likes that work.
